vega.uplink.commanding

Class ModelState

  • java.lang.Object
    • CompositeDataset
      • vega.uplink.commanding.ModelState

  • public class ModelState
extends CompositeDataset
    Class to store the status of the spacecraft (states of the instruments and power consumed) at any given time. Within this class the definition of the following items may be confusing: Subsystem: a spacecraft subsystem. It is is not an instrument, as instruments may have different subsystems State: state of an subinstrument Mode: it is composed of the subinstrument and the state. It is build as subinstrument_state example: Mode or state : AL_HV_Off SubSystem: AL_HV_ Instrument: AL (Alice)

      Creates an empty status
